attributes.action: re-instate Margaret Haywood as it is outrageous that she has lost her job for whistleblowing about the appauling state of care for the elderly in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely outrageous that the NMC have put rules before compassion and have struck Margaret Haywood off for filming the demeaning and inhumane treatment of elderly patients, the NHS needs more ladies like her not less of them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
